useCase.name: User Login
useCase.description: User logs in to the system.

preconditions.precondition: Admin is registered in the system.

mainSequence.step: Controller initiates login with provided credentials.
AdminModel fetches admin data by username.
Database queries admin data by username.
AdminModel receives admin data from the database.
Router responds with success or unauthorized status.
UI displays dashboard or error message based on response.
